name: Related Post widget side

sections.description:
Related Post widget side is free plugin for show related posts link in sidebar. It would be seo friendly for your website. Improve website look also.

sections.faq:
Will Related Post widget side plugin work with my latest WordPress installation ?

Yes, Sure Related Post widget side is tested and created with new version of WordPress.

Will Related Post widget side plugin work with my themes?

Of course! FormGet Contact Form plugin works out-of-the-box with every WordPress themes and other plugins. It work with the vast majority of premium and free themes, without requiring any coding.

Where can I report a bug?

Report bugs and participate in development at http://www.vashikaran.biz/contact-us.php/.

How can I add a field to Related Post widget side?

To add a new field in the Related Post widget side go to your dashboard, click on edit icon of the Related Post widget side that you want to edit.
